title: Babel Finance issues first collateralised USDC eNoteTM based on FQX's Solana dApp using Fireblocks custody wallets - Yahoo Finance
content: Babel Finance issues first collateralised USDC eNoteTM based on FQX's Solana dApp using Fireblocks custody wallets  Yahoo Finance
description: Babel Finance, a leading global crypto financial services provider, announced today that it has successfully issued the first collateralised USDC note via eNotesTM, a smart contract-based global debt instrument, provided by blockchain start-up FQX AG on their Solana environment.
